      • GetRef

        public final long GetRef()

      • GetIndexInPage

        public int GetIndexInPage()
        get this annotation index in page.
        Returns:
        0 based index value or -1;

      • MoveToPage

        public final boolean MoveToPage(Page dst_page,
                                float[] rect)
        move annotation to another page. this method require professional or premium license.
        this method just like invoke Page.CopyAnnot() and Annotation.RemoveFromPage(), but, less data generated.
        Notice: ObjsStart or RenderXXX shall be invoked for dst_page.
        Parameters:
        dst_page - page to move.
        rect - [left, top, right, bottom] in PDF coordinate in dst_page.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • RenderToBmp

        public final boolean RenderToBmp(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        render an annotation to Bitmap. this method fully scale annotation to bitmap object.
        this method require professional or premium license.
        Notice 1: the render result may not correct for some annotation that not used Alpha Color blending.
        example: highlight annotation may not render correctly.
        Notice 2: you can invoke Global.hideAnnots() in Global.Init(), and invoke this method to handle Annotations by yourself.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap object.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • GetFieldType

        public final int GetFieldType()
        get annotation field type in acroForm.
        this method require premium license
        Returns:
        type as these values:
        0: unknown
        1: button field
        2: text field
        3: choice field
        4: signature field

      • GetFieldFlag

        public final int GetFieldFlag()
        get annotation field flag in acroForm.
        this method require premium license
        Returns:
        flag&1 : read-only
        flag&2 : is required
        flag&4 : no export.

        public final java.lang.String GetFieldName()

        this method require premium license
        Returns:
        null if it is not field, or name of the annotation, example: "EditBox1[0]".

      • GetType

        public final int GetType()
        get annotation type.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Returns:
        type as these values:
        0: unknown
        1: text
        2: link
        3: free text
        4: line
        5: square
        6: circle
        7: polygon
        8: polyline
        9: text hilight
        10: text under line
        11: text squiggly
        12: text strikeout
        13: stamp
        14: caret
        15: ink
        16: popup
        17: file attachment
        18: sound
        19: movie
        20: widget
        21: screen
        22: print mark
        23: trap net
        24: water mark
        25: 3d object
        26: rich media

      • GetModifyDate

        public final java.lang.String GetModifyDate()
        get modify DateTime of Annotation.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Returns:
        DateTime String object
        format as (D:YYYYMMDDHHmmSSOHH'mm') where:
        YYYY is the year
        MM is the month
        DD is the day (01â€“31)
        HH is the hour (00â€“23)
        mm is the minute (00â€“59)
        SS is the second (00â€“59)
        O is the relationship of local time to Universal Time (UT), denoted by one of the characters +, âˆ’, or Z (see below)
        HH followed by ' is the absolute value of the offset from UT in hours (00â€“23)
        mm followed by ' is the absolute value of the offset from UT in minutes (00â€“59)
        more details see PDF-Reference-1.7 section 3.8.3

      • SetModifyDate

        public final boolean SetModifyDate(java.lang.String mdt)
        set modify DateTime of Annotation.
        this method require professional or premium license.
        Parameters:
        mdt - the format descript in GetModifyDate() or PDF-Reference-1.7 section 3.8.3
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • GetMarkupRects

        public final float[] GetMarkupRects()
        get markup annotation's boxes.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Returns:
        float array, container many boxes.
        each 4 elements defined a box, as [left, top, right, bottom] in PDF coordinate.
        length of this array must be 4 times.

      • GetAdditionalJS

        public final java.lang.String GetAdditionalJS(int idx)
        get additional action, for java script.
        Parameters:
        idx - ievent type as below:
        0:(Optional; PDF 1.2) An action to be performed when the cursor enters the annotationâ€™s active area.
        1:(Optional; PDF 1.2) An action to be performed when the cursor exits the annotationâ€™s active area.
        2 (Optional; PDF 1.2) An action to be performed when the mouse button is pressed inside the annotationâ€™s active area. (The name D stands for "down.")
        3:(Optional; PDF 1.2) An action to be performed when the mouse button is released inside the annotationâ€™s active area. (The name U stands for "up.")
        4:(Optional; PDF 1.2; widget annotations only) An action to be performed when the annotation receives the input focus.
        5:(Optional; PDF 1.2; widget annotations only) (Uppercase B, lowercase L) An action to be performed when the annotation loses the input focus. (The name Bl stands for "blurred.")
        6:(Optional; PDF 1.5) An action to be performed when the page containing the annotation is opened (for example, when the user navigates to it from the next or previous page or by means of a link annotation or outline item). The action is executed after the O action in the pageâ€™s additional-actions dictionary (see Table 8.45) and the OpenAction entry in the document catalog (see Table 3.25), if such actions are present.
        7:(Optional; PDF 1.5) An action to be performed when the page containing the annotation is closed (for example, when the user navigates to the next or previous page, or follows a link annotation or outline item). The action is executed before the C action in the pageâ€™s additional-actions dictionary (see Table 8.45), if present.
        8:(Optional; PDF 1.5) An action to be performed when the page containing the annotation becomes visible in the viewer applicationâ€™s user interface.
        9:(Optional; PDF 1.5) An action to be performed when the page containing the annotation is no longer visible in the viewer applicationâ€™s user interface.
        Returns:
        string of java-script, or null.

      • GetRichMediaItemType

        public final int GetRichMediaItemType(int idx)
        get content type of an item of RichMedia annotation.
        this method require professional or premium license.
        Parameters:
        idx - range in [0, Annot.GetRichMediaItemCount()]
        Returns:
        type of item:
        -1: unknown or error.
        0: Video.
        1ï¼šSound.
        2:Flash file object.
        3:3D file object.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        parameter string, or null.
        parameter example: "source=myvideo.mp4&skin=SkinOverAllNoFullNoCaption.swf&skinAutoHide=true&skinBackgroundColor=0x5F5F5F&skinBackgroundAlpha=0.75&volume=1.00"

      • GetRichMediaItemSource

        public final java.lang.String GetRichMediaItemSource(int idx)
        return source of an item of RichMedia annotation.
        this method require professional or premium license.
        Parameters:
        idx - range in [0, Annot.GetRichMediaItemCount()]
        Returns:
        parameter string, or null.
        parameter example: "source=myvideo.mp4&skin=SkinOverAllNoFullNoCaption.swf&skinAutoHide=true&skinBackgroundColor=0x5F5F5F&skinBackgroundAlpha=0.75&volume=1.00"
        the source is "source=myvideo.mp4", return string is "myvideo.mp4"

      • GetRichMediaItemSourceData

        public final boolean GetRichMediaItemSourceData(int idx,
                                                java.lang.String save_path)
        save source of an item of RichMedia annotation to a file.
        this method require professional or premium license.
        Parameters:
        idx - range in [0, Annot.GetRichMediaItemCount()]
        save_path - absolute path to save file, like "/sdcard/app_data/myvideo.mp4"
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • GetRichMediaData

        public final boolean GetRichMediaData(java.lang.String asset,
                                      java.lang.String save_path)
        save an asset to a file.
        this method require professional or premium license.
        Parameters:
        asset - asset name in RichMedia assets list.
        save_path - absolute path to save file, like "/sdcard/app_data/myvideo.mp4"
        Returns:
        true or false. example:
        GetRichMediaItemAsset(0) return player window named as "VideoPlayer.swf"
        GetRichMediaItemPara(0) return "source=myvideo.mp4&skin=SkinOverAllNoFullNoCaption.swf&skinAutoHide=true&skinBackgroundColor=0x5F5F5F&skinBackgroundAlpha=0.75&volume=1.00".
        so we has 3 assets in item[0]:
        1."VideoPlayer.swf"
        2."myvideo.mp4"
        3."SkinOverAllNoFullNoCaption.swf"

      • GetEditType

        public final int GetEditType()
        get type of edit-box.
        this method require premium license
        Returns:

        -1: this annotation is not text-box.
        1: normal single line.
        2: password.
        3: MultiLine edit area.

      • GetFieldJS

        public final java.lang.String GetFieldJS(int idx)
        get jsvascript action of fields.
        this method require premium license.
        Parameters:
        idx - action index:
        0:'K' performed when the user types a keystroke
        1:'F' to be performed before the field is formatted to display its current value.
        2:'V' to be performed when the fieldâ€™s value is changed
        3:'C' to be performed to recalculate the value of this field when that of another field changes.
        Returns:
        javsscript of field's action, mostly a java-script like:

      • GetFieldFormat

        public final java.lang.String GetFieldFormat()
        get format of field.
        this method require premium license
        Returns:
        format of field, mostly a java-script like:
        AFDate_FormatEx("dd/mm/yy");
        most common java script function invoked as: AFNumber_Format
        AFDate_Format
        AFTime_Format
        AFSpecial_Format
        AFPercent_Format
        and so on.

      • SetEditText

        public final boolean SetEditText(java.lang.String text)
        set value of edit-box.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this method require premium license.
        Notice: this method not check format as GetEditTextFormat. developers shall check format by developer self.
        Parameters:
        text - contents to be set.
        in MultiLine mode: '\r' or '\n' means change line.
        in password mode the edit box always display "*".
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • SetIcon

        public final boolean SetIcon(int icon)
        set icon for sticky text note/file attachment/Rubber Stamp annotation.
        you need render page again to show modified annotation.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        icon - icon value depends on annotation type.
        For sticky text note:
        0: Note
        1: Comment
        2: Key
        3: Help
        4: NewParagraph
        5: Paragraph
        6: Insert
        7: Check
        8: Circle
        9: Cross
        For file attachment:
        0: PushPin
        1: Graph
        2: Paperclip
        3: Tag
        For Rubber Stamp:
        0: "Draft"(default icon)
        1: "Approved"
        2: "Experimental"
        3: "NotApproved"
        4: "AsIs"
        5: "Expired"
        6: "NotForPublicRelease"
        7: "Confidential"
        8: "Final"
        9: "Sold"
        10: "Departmental"
        11: "ForComment"
        12: "TopSecret"
        13: "ForPublicRelease"
        14: "Accepted"
        15: "Rejected"
        16: "Witness"
        17: "InitialHere"
        18: "SignHere"
        19: "Void"
        20: "Completed"
        21: "PreliminaryResults"
        22: "InformationOnly"
        23: "End"
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • SetIcon

                             Document.DocForm form)

      • SignField

        public final int SignField(Document.DocForm form,
                           java.lang.String cert_file,
                           java.lang.String pswd,
                           java.lang.String reason,
                           java.lang.String location,
                           java.lang.String contact)
        sign the empty field and save the PDF file.
        if the signature field is not empty(signed), it will return failed.
        this method require premium license.
        Parameters:
        form - appearance icon for signature
        cert_file - a cert file like .p12 or .pfx file, DER encoded cert file.
        pswd - password to open cert file.
        reason - sign reason will write to signature.
        location - signature location will write to signature.
        contact - contact info will write to signature.
        Returns:
        0 mean OK, others are failed.
